remarks: The inverse of a group element.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
grpinvfval.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
grpinvfval.2 $e |- U = ( GId ` G ) $.
grpinvfval.3 $e |- N = ( inv ` G ) $.
grpoinvval $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( N ` A ) = ( iota_ y e. X ( y G A ) = U ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d G y $.
$d X y $.
